text: Srichand Parmanand Hinduja (28 November 1935 â€“ 17 May 2023) was an Indian-born British billionaire business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He was the primary shareholder and chairman of Hinduja Group of companies. As of May 2020, together with his brother Gopichand he was the UK's second richest man. Since the 1990s, he had been consistently ranked among the UK and Asia's richest people. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Indian businesspeople Category:British businesspeople
title: S. P. Hinduja
